definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (conspicuous ? On ending [[ת]] cf. Dr 1Sa 17:4 & Nö in Eut:Nab 73) ([[גׇּלְיׇת]] 1Ch 20:5) Philistine giant slain by David 1Sa 17:4, 1Sa 17:23, 1Sa 21:10, 1Sa 22:10, but acc. to 2Sa 21:19 slain by Elhanan of Bethlehem ([[בֵּית הַלַּחְמִי]]; acc to 1Ch 20:5 Elhanan slew [[לַחְמִי]] brother of Goliath).
